column2: Hexindai Inc. is a holding company, which engages in the operation of online marketplace connecting borrowers and investors. The company is headquartered in Beijing, Beijing and currently employs 552 full-time employees. The firm is focused on offering borrowers a range of products designed-based on customer segmentation data and tailored to the specific needs of the emerging middle class in China. The firm also offers five tailored loan products such as Provident Fund Loans, Property-Owner Loans, Car-Owner Loans, Insurance-Holder Loans, and Premier Customer Loans. The firm offers products and services to Borrowers, and Investors.
5Th Floor, Block C, Shimao No. 92 Jianguo Road Cha
